content: UAV State transitions When requested the _VehicleCore_ shall shall transition the UAV between states according to allowed state transitions as depicted in the UAV state transition diagram
UAV activation The _UAVActivationManager_ shall only activate UAVs that are registered.
UAV type specification assignment The _VehicleCore_ shall associate a {{{{UAV_TYPE}}}} for each UAV defining its basic attributes.
Removal of planned flight If requested the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.
Flight route persistence The _FlightRouteManager_ shall persist flight routes.
